DROP TABLE clusters
func:
msg.topic = 'DROP TABLE IF EXISTS clusters';

name: CREATE TABLE clusters
func:
msg.topic = 'CREATE TABLE clusters (clusterid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, station TEXT, day TEXT, highcentroid TEXT, middlecentroid TEXT, lowcentroid TEXT)';
return msg;

name: SELECT *
func:
msg.topic = 'SELECT * FROM clusters';
return msg;

name: CREATE TABLE users
func:

return msg;
